name: ext_R5_Permission
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Permission for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents Permission from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Permission|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Permission resource holds access rules for a given data and context.
